column1: 254416,Registered Nurse (Developmental Disability),,"Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column3: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column5: Engage patients in exercises or activities
column9: Teach basic living or other adaptive skills to patients or caregivers
column11: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column15: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column17: Position patients for treatment or examination
column19: Monitor clients to evaluate treatment progress
column21: Provide medical care and support for people with intellectual and developmental disabilities
column23: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column25: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column27: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column31: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column33: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column39: Administer health care or medical treatments
column43: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column45: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column47: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column49: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column53: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
